code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL||'';const VoiceStudioPage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[voices,setVoices]=useState([]);const[selected,setSelected]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/api/voices")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setVoices(data);setSelected(data[0]);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-background-dark","data-testid":"voice-studio-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"border-b border-forest",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between px-6 py-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/dashboard'),className:"mono-ui text-xs text-forest hover:text-primary",children:"\u2190 [BACK]"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-display text-lg text-white",children:"[Regional Voice Studio]"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto p-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",children:voices.map(voice=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border p-6 cursor-pointer transition-all ".concat((selected===null||selected===void 0?void 0:selected.id)===voice.id?'bg-primary text-background-dark border-primary':'border-forest hover:border-primary'),onClick:()=>setSelected(voice),"data-testid":"studio-voice-".concat(voice.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-display text-lg font-bold uppercase mb-1",children:voice.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"mono-ui text-[10px] opacity-70",children:voice.accent}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm mt-3 opacity-80",children:voice.description})]},voice.id))})})]});};export default VoiceStudioPage;
